:[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"dr","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"inclusionReward","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"tallyReward","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"result","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"blockNumber","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"epoch","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"drHash","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address Foundation","details":"This contract enables posting requests that Witnet bridges will insert into the Witnet network. The result of the requests will be posted back to this contract by the bridge nodes too.","methods":{"checkDataRequestsClaimability(uint256[])":{"details":"Checks if the data requests from a list are claimable or not.","params":{"_ids":"The list of data request identifiers to be checked."},"returns":{"_0":"An array of booleans indicating if data requests are claimable or not."}},"claimDataRequests(uint256[],uint256[4],uint256[2],uint256[2],uint256[4],bytes)":{"details":"Claim drs to be posted to Witnet by the node.","params":{"_ids":"Data request ids to be claimed.","_poe":"PoE claiming eligibility.","_uPoint":"uPoint coordinates as [uPointX, uPointY] corresponding to U = s*B - c*Y.","_vPointHelpers":"helpers for calculating the V point as [(s*H)X, (s*H)Y, cGammaX, cGammaY]. V = s*H + cGamma."}},"computeFastVerifyParams(uint256[2],uint256[4],bytes)":{"details":"Wrapper around the computeFastVerifyParams from VRF library.Compute the parameters (EC points) required for the VRF fast verification function..","params":{"_message":"The message (in bytes) used for computing the VRF.","_proof":"The VRF proof as an array composed of `[gamma-x, gamma-y, c, s]`.","_publicKey":"The public key as an array composed of `[pubKey-x, pubKey-y]`."},"returns":{"_0":"The fast verify required parameters as the tuple `([uPointX, uPointY], [sHX, sHY, cGammaX, cGammaY])`."}},"constructor":{"params":{"_blockRelayAddress":"BlockRelayProxy address.","_repFactor":"replication factor."}},"decodePoint(bytes)":{"details":"Decode EC point from bytes.","params":{"_point":"The EC point as bytes."},"returns":{"_0":"The point as `[point-x, point-y]`."}},"decodeProof(bytes)":{"details":"Decode VRF proof from bytes.","params":{"_proof":"The VRF proof as an array composed of `[gamma-x, gamma-y, c, s]`."},"returns":{"_0":"The VRF proof as an array composed of `[gamma-x, gamma-y, c, s]`."}},"getLastBeacon()":{"details":"Read the beacon of the last block inserted.","returns":{"_0":"bytes to be signed by the node as PoE."}},"isUpgradable(address)":{"details":"Verifies if the contract is upgradable.","returns":{"_0":"true if the contract upgradable."}},"postDataRequest(bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Posts a data request into the WRB in expectation that it will be relayed and resolved in Witnet with a total reward that equals to msg.value.","params":{"_serialized":"The bytes corresponding to the Protocol Buffers serialization of the data request output.","_tallyReward":"The amount of value that will be detracted from the transaction value and reserved for rewarding the reporting of the final result (aka tally) of the data request."},"returns":{"_0":"The unique identifier of the data request."}},"readDataRequest(uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves the bytes of the serialization of one data request from the WRB.","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the data request."},"returns":{"_0":"The result of the data request as bytes."}},"readDrHash(uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves hash of the data request transaction in Witnet.","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the data request."},"returns":{"_0":"The hash of the DataRequest transaction in Witnet."}},"readResult(uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves the result (if already available) of one data request from the WRB.","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the data request."},"returns":{"_0":"The result of the DR"}},"reportDataRequestInclusion(uint256,uint256[],uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Presents a proof of inclusion to prove that the request was posted into Witnet so as to unlock the inclusion reward that was put aside for the claiming identity (public key hash).","params":{"_blockHash":"The hash of the block in which the data request was inserted.","_epoch":"The epoch in which the blockHash was created.","_id":"The unique identifier of the data request.","_index":"The index in the merkle tree.","_poi":"A proof of inclusion proving that the data request appears listed in one recent block in Witnet."}},"reportResult(uint256,uint256[],uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Reports the result of a data request in Witnet.","params":{"_blockHash":"The hash of the block in which the result (tally) was inserted.","_epoch":"The epoch in which the blockHash was created.","_id":"The unique identifier of the data request.","_index":"The position of the tally transaction in the tallies-only merkle tree in the Witnet block.","_poi":"A proof of inclusion proving that the data in _result has been acknowledged by the Witnet network as being the final result for the data request by putting in a tally transaction inside a Witnet block.","_result":"The result itself as bytes."}},"requestsCount()":{"details":"Returns the number of data requests in the WRB.","returns":{"_0":"the number of data requests in the WRB."}},"updateAbsActivity(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the ABS activity with the block number provided.","params":{"_blockNumber":"update the ABS until this block number."}},"upgradeDataRequest(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Increments the rewards of a data request by adding more value to it. The new request reward will be increased by msg.value minus the difference between the former tally reward and the new tally reward.","params":{"_id":"The unique identifier of the data request.","_tallyReward":"The new tally reward. Needs to be equal or greater than the former tally reward."}}},"title":"Witnet Requests Board"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"constructor":"Include an address to specify the Witnet Block Relay and a replication factor.","decodePoint(bytes)":{"notice":"Wrapper around the decodePoint from VRF library."},"decodeProof(bytes)":{"notice":"Wrapper around the decodeProof from VRF library."}},"notice":"Contract to bridge requests to devdoc.author: Witnet Foundation
devdoc.details: This contract enables posting requests that Witnet bridges will insert into the Witnet network. The result of the requests will be posted back to this contract by the bridge nodes too.

checkDataRequestsClaimability(uint256[]).details: Checks if the data requests from a list are claimable or not.

params._ids: The list of data request identifiers to be checked.

returns._0: An array of booleans indicating if data requests are claimable or not.

claimDataRequests(uint256[],uint256[4],u.details: Claim drs to be posted to Witnet by the node.

params._ids: Data request ids to be claimed.
params._uPoint: uPoint coordinates as [uPointX, uPointY] corresponding to U = s*B - c*Y.
params._vPointHelpers: helpers for calculating the V point as [(s*H)X, (s*H)Y, cGammaX, cGammaY]. V = s*H + cGamma.

computeFastVerifyParams(uint256[2],uint2.details: Wrapper around the computeFastVerifyParams from VRF library.Compute the parameters (EC points) required for the VRF fast verification function..

params._message: The message (in bytes) used for computing the VRF.
params._proof: The VRF proof as an array composed of `[gamma-x, gamma-y, c, s]`.
params._publicKey: The public key as an array composed of `[pubKey-x, pubKey-y]`.

returns._0: The fast verify required parameters as the tuple `([uPointX, uPointY], [sHX, sHY, cGammaX, cGammaY])`.

params._proof: The VRF proof as an array composed of `[gamma-x, gamma-y, c, s]`.

returns._0: The VRF proof as an array composed of `[gamma-x, gamma-y, c, s]`.

getLastBeacon().details: Read the beacon of the last block inserted.

returns._0: bytes to be signed by the node as PoE.

isUpgradable(address).details: Verifies if the contract is upgradable.

postDataRequest(bytes,uint256).details: Posts a data request into the WRB in expectation that it will be relayed and resolved in Witnet with a total reward that equals to msg.value.

params._serialized: The bytes corresponding to the Protocol Buffers serialization of the data request output.
params._tallyReward: The amount of value that will be detracted from the transaction value and reserved for rewarding the reporting of the final result (aka tally) of the data request.

returns._0: The unique identifier of the data request.

readDataRequest(uint256).details: Retrieves the bytes of the serialization of one data request from the WRB.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

returns._0: The result of the data request as bytes.

readDrHash(uint256).details: Retrieves hash of the data request transaction in Witnet.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

returns._0: The hash of the DataRequest transaction in Witnet.

readResult(uint256).details: Retrieves the result (if already available) of one data request from the WRB.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

reportDataRequestInclusion(uint256,uint2.details: Presents a proof of inclusion to prove that the request was posted into Witnet so as to unlock the inclusion reward that was put aside for the claiming identity (public key hash).

params._blockHash: The hash of the block in which the data request was inserted.
params._epoch: The epoch in which the blockHash was created.
params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.
params._index: The index in the merkle tree.
params._poi: A proof of inclusion proving that the data request appears listed in one recent block in Witnet.

reportResult(uint256,uint256[],uint256,u.details: Reports the result of a data request in Witnet.

params._blockHash: The hash of the block in which the result (tally) was inserted.
params._epoch: The epoch in which the blockHash was created.
params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.
params._index: The position of the tally transaction in the tallies-only merkle tree in the Witnet block.
params._poi: A proof of inclusion proving that the data in _result has been acknowledged by the Witnet network as being the final result for the data request by putting in a tally transaction inside a Witnet block.

requestsCount().details: Returns the number of data requests in the WRB.

returns._0: the number of data requests in the WRB.

updateAbsActivity(uint256).details: Updates the ABS activity with the block number provided.

params._blockNumber: update the ABS until this block number.

upgradeDataRequest(uint256,uint256).details: Increments the rewards of a data request by adding more value to it. The new request reward will be increased by msg.value minus the difference between the former tally reward and the new tally reward.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.
params._tallyReward: The new tally reward. Needs to be equal or greater than the former tally reward.

devdoc.title: Witnet Requests Board

methods.constructor: Include an address to specify the Witnet Block Relay and a replication factor.

decodePoint(bytes).notice: Wrapper around the decodePoint from VRF library.

decodeProof(bytes).notice: Wrapper around the decodeProof from VRF library.

userdoc.notice: Contract to bridge requests to Witnet.
